name: Road Bustle Online
description: Road Bustle Online is a competitive online game for up to 8 players on the road in real-time, set in the streets of the Road Bustle world. Bright graphics and pulsating rhythms set the stage for adrenaline-filled sessions. Navigate your way through increasing traffic, dodge vehicles, and outsmart your opponents to reach the finish line. Ready? On your marks!

name: Dabman: When The Haters Dab Back Remastered
description: Relive this 2018 classic from Kimulator's Films in a remaster of one of their first game ever!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 1
description: Iridium from Team Silencerz and RD-05 from Racing Drones. Two almost opposite vehicles, speed and elegance vs strength and massive muscles. A perfect mix to add to your personal garage, that true AcceleRacers fans can't miss.

name: Spy vs Spy
description: The black spy and the white spy are out to outsmart each other before the time bell rings. Find the needed objects (money, passport, secret plans and airport door key) by searching rooms in the embassy, which include desks, file cabinets and other furniture. Foil your opponent by setting creative booby traps in the various rooms (a bomb in a dresser drawer, for instance). Traps can be disarmed with objects found in rooms (a water bucket from a firebox on the wall will disarm the bomb in the prior example). When all the items are together in the secret briefcase, head for the airport door.

name: MagMax
description:
A horizontal scrolling shooter, players control the title hover ship in an attempt to completely construct the ship into a giant robot and to destroy any enemies attempting to stop it.

The three-headed mechanical dragon found as a boss character in the game, known as Babylon, strongly resembles Mecha-King Ghidorah from the Godzilla franchise.

name: Seicross
description: The player rides a motorcycle-like craft, bumping other riders, collecting 'power' modules and shooting blue coins.

name: A Bar Where Men Go To Be Turned Into Horses
description: 5 men. 5 shots. 10 minutes until transformation.

name: Night Shift at Fazclaire's Nightclub
description:
Night Shift at Fazclaire's Nightclub is a 3D freeroam FNAF parody NSFW game and does contain nudity, sex and suggestive themes. Your aims are :

1. Complete all the tasks you will get during the night, such as entering rooms or finding lost items.
2. Keep up the energy in 3 generators located in the nightclub.
3. Watch your sanity and energy.
4. D̶o̶n̶'̶t̶ get caught by animatronics/h̶a̶l̶l̶u̶c̶i̶n̶a̶t̶i̶o̶n̶s̶.

name: Lustful Desires
description: A homoerotic visual-novel and rpg by Hyao.

name: Aqua Mundo
description: Inspired by classic theme park games, Aqua Mundo allows you to build the waterpark of your dreams! Design pools, lazy rivers, and water slides while sculpting an immersive thematic world. Keep guests entertained and maintain your infrastructure to keep the park afloat financially.

name: Crusader Kings III: Legends of the Dead
description: What good are grand accomplishments and heroic deeds if no one sings of them after you have gone? A royal legacy is only useful, after all, if it can provide cover and legitimacy for those who come after you. Live on in the memory of your subjects and rivals in Legends of the Dead.

name: Puzzles of the Paladin
description: A free sokoban-like game with RPG items and Monsters, inspired by the game Dungeon and Puzzles by Nekolyst, made in PICO-8.

name: Betrayed
description: Enter Betrayed, a 3-16 player party shooter where trust is scarce, and deception is paramount. Navigate diverse maps, use proximity voice chat to strategize, and earn currency for traitorous tools. Will you prove innocence or master deception? Gather your friends for suspense and laughter!

name: Rock 'N' Roll Clams
description:
There's a Motion in the Ocean...

Help Caspar Clam and Band shake, rattle and roll their way from the Bottom of the Ocean to the Top of the Charts!

Get out of your shell and hang on to your pearls as you send the Record Business into a spin!

name: Vanguard Monsters
description: Vanguard Monsters is a Roguelite Autobattler where you raise a party of monsters, collect treasure, and do battle to fend off the invading forces of the Void. Battles happen automatically, with anywhere between 1 to 6 monsters on either side of the field. Each monster attacks or uses their ability when their respect charge meters fill, so you will need to choose the best formation at the start of the battle to tackle what unique challenges the enemies present each time. You move a monster in battle but theres a cooldown on this, so time it wisely to protect someone weak or concentrate damage on a big threat! When a monster reaches 0 hp it will be unable to fight for the rest of that battle and your party will accrue a wound. Gain too many wounds and your monsters will be unable to continue their quest.

name: Abstêmia
description: An endless chime, each second bringing you closer and closer to an imminent end. Embark on an adventure inside the familiar corridors of Eduardo's house and watch his residence slowly transfigure into something grotesque and terrifying. Good luck on your adventure, may they have mercy on your soul. And remember: the C.G.C. is watching you.

name: Lightdancer
description: Embark on a mystical journey through the enchanted forest as a Lightdancer, an elite archer bound by oath to restore the balance of light and shadow. Wield your Soliflare arrow, a unique weapon infused with the power of both sun and moon, capable of setting ablaze both matter and malevolent spirits.

name: Tuttuki Bako
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider Fighter 3
description: Spider Fighter 3 is a free-to-play adventure game from Starplay DMCC. Inspired by Marvel’s Spider-Man, this puts you in control of a web-slinging hero named Peter. Climb walls and swing across town as you fight thugs and mobsters making life difficult for everyday people. Choose between a linear story mode or an open-world sandbox experience.

Refresh your daily fatigue with a soothing hot spring!

description: Descend into the nightmare of Paradiso in melessthanthree's action-RPGs Lucah: Born of a Dream and Death of a Wish!

name: Pony World: Color by Numbers & Animal Golf: Battle Race Bundle

+
Cute animal golf battle race game!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2
description: Beauties Unveiled 2 is a continuation of the mesmerizing journey from Part 1, that pairs the familiar excitement of classic arcade games with manga-inspired, and hentai-inspired art.

name: Become The Wild
description: Survive in the wilderness and become the wild

name: Chip and Charge
description: Chip and Charge is an arcade-style tennis game with a fully customizable character and equipment and dozens of new cosmetics!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Cassy Level Pack
description: Clumsiness and turbulences don’t go together very well and may ruin a flight… Or make it a more memorable experience. Cassy may show you just how memorable but don’t be mad at her if she manages to spill something on you.

name: DIY Fashion Star
description: Refresh your wardrobe with stylish DIY projects and put your clothing design skills to the test!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Arts & Crafts
description:
Redesign your new clothes and decorate them with new patches and accessories!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- new DIY summer top
- new stylish DIY skirt
- new elegant DIY dress
- skull patch
- lips patch
- eye patch
- blue bow accessory
- orange button accessory

Use your designer imagination and create new DIY projects that everyone will love!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Glow Up!
description:
Give your doll a unique look with new stylish hairstyles and a new face-painting option!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- 2 different hairstyles with beautiful braids
- face-painting tab with 10 different colorful designs ranging from butterflies and stars to lovely flowers

Dye your new magical hair and paint your face using the new feature!

name: DIY Fashion Star: Stylish Outfits
description:
Change your doll's style with cute and brand-new clothes!

With this DLC you will unlock:
- beautiful dress in red, green, pink and orange colors
- stylish glasses in blue, aqua blue, orange and pink colors
- baseball sweatshirt in red, blue, orange and purple colors
- denim shorts in blue, aqua blue, red and orange colors
- fashionable heeled shoes in blue, pink, orange and green colors

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Gold Edition
description: Pre-order the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition to receive the Macragge&rsquos Chosen DLC and play up to 3 days before release.About the early unlock:The early unlock is not guaranteed for Canada territory.Please make sure to check the shipping time when you place your order to ensure delivery before the release.Day one delivery is not guaranteed with standard shipping option.The Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Gold Edition includes the base game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, the Season Pass and an exclusive Steelbook.Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or co-op modes.

name: Uradrasill
description: "Mahjong" x "Battle" A mahjong battle game that can be enjoyed like a puzzle!

name: Madoromi Travel
description: If you fall asleep, the game ends immediately. Slumber Travel" is a death-memory type simulation. Enjoy a mysterious trip through various troubles in the city of sleep, which governs sleep.

name: Overworked Alice
description: This is a precise platform game modeled after the King of Jumps.

name: Promise with My Sister
description: A story centered around sisters, and as their brother, I must protect them. My mission is to find and reclaim the memories of time spent with my sisters. Numerous adventures filled with challenges are just beginning. This is my very own RPG life!

name: Investigator Trials
description: In the game, you will play the role of an intern examiner and participate in a trial to become an official examiner. Strive to defeat one mechanical guard after another and powerful enemies through trial and error, in order to unleash one's true strength and transform into various combat postures.

name: Backrooms: Beyond One Year
description: One year after the existence of backrooms was announced, a large number of enterprises, groups, and individuals wanderers are rushing into this world. Danger, terror, and even death could not stop humanity's desire for benefits!You are a wanderer who is going tomake some money with them....

name: Fumo
description: "Fumo" is a 3D immortal MMORPG, set against the backdrop of ancient Chinese mythology, fairy tales, allusions, and history, depicting a magnificent and imaginative painting for players.

name: Ultimate Fatal Octopus
description: A Touhou Project fan-made STG, also a collab game with Vtuber Syrena. Some day a random suspicious pink UFO showed up in Gensokyo. This must be an incident! As a result, Reimu and Marisa went on a journey to solve the incident.

name: Kottabos VR
description: This is a VR trip into the ancient world - playing Kottabos, the all-time favorite Greek party game. Prove your skill by throwing the dregs of wine from your cup at the metal disk on the pole in front of you, or fling your drops at the little cups floating in a bowl.

name: Solar Quiz VR
description: The educational app Solar Quiz VR will introduce you to the planets of our Solar system in virtual reality mode in the format of an entertaining quiz.

name: Forged In Dungeon
description: 'Forged In Dungeon' is a thrilling top-down action shooter, blend futuristic weapons and martial arts together to take down enemies in stylish and violence ways.

name: EndlessChoice
description: EndlessChoice is a deck-building game that uses dice and cards. players can choose different professions, weapons, and cards, along with various unique items to build their own deck. Players can also invite friends to cooperate in defeating enemies, with a maximum of three people playing together.

name: Lang Ops: Greek
description: The road to efficiency leads through repetition. Lang Ops allows you to get accustomed to Greek language at your own pace! Features a lot of different tests to guarantee success!

name: GuluGuluLand 3D
description: A classic action-style, 3D game from the NES era! Unity-chan keeps running and can't stop. Use the actions of grabbing the stick with one hand to turn, and grabbing the stick with both hands to jump, and lead her to clear the stage.

name: Lone Lamp
description: A point-and-click puzzle adventure

name: Right or Die!
description: Navigate an ever changing maze where every turn could be your last...

name: Pingdom
description: Pingdom is a Tower Defence game with endless replayability with the random terrain generation and wave system.

name: Pacific Minesweeper
description: Dive into the Pacific's depths in a submersible, navigating through different areas to defuse mines and score points. Aim for precision with limited shots. Avoid errors to keep your lives. Experience high-stakes, strategic gameplay in this free singleplayer adventure!

name: Ludicrous Leap
description: Fast-Paced, Level-Based 3D Platformer - Jump, Dodge, Climb, and Run! Try to beat the Bronze, Silver, and Gold times for each level (if you can even beat the levels at all)!

name: Capoo Pals for MAC
description: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: Ordinary Stickman Goes For A Walk
description: Ordinary Stickman Goes For A Walk is a 2D platformer with lots of different mechanics and a little bit of humor down the road.

name: GMH: Good Morning Human!
description: In a synthwave-inspired universe, achieve the best possible scores by avoiding obstacles in your path. Control and skills will be necessary to complete each level.

name: Just Dodge, LOL
description: When you have no weapon, no magic and no help - just dodge. Complete a set of trials to prove that you are a Dodge Grandmaster!

name: Nirvana
description: Nirvana is a "Multi Action Loglike" game that compares the characteristics of the loglike genre to the doctrine of Tibetan Buddhism's reincarnation. Go on an adventure to protect the world by becoming twins Padma and Pema, who shared the power of God that should lead to one for generations!

name: Is it different or not?
description: Your task is to scrutinize every corner of a schoolroom for differences. If the room is perfect, you can safely move forward. However, if you notice even the slightest difference, you must step back. Your primary weapon in this game is a keen eye and quick reaction time.

name: Skateboard Gravity
description: Skateboard Gravity: A Journey into the Gravitational World

name: Ghost legend
description: This is a racing simulation game with a bicycle themed gameplay,

name: Five elements for 24!
description: On that day, mankind remembered the fear of being dominated by the math Olympiad in primary school. 4 random numbers, 3 operations, get 24 points!

name: The Hell: City Builder of the Dead
description: Welcome to the city-building game set in the depths of Hell. Assume the role of the Hell Governor and embrace the challenge of welcoming souls who perished in major, historically accurate human catastrophes. Are you ready to build and govern your own infernal city?

name: Rei Galo TD
description: Protect your kingdom in a game that combines Tower Defense and Action RPG. Build your perfect defense with towers, skills, hero, upgrades, and research to face 200+ different enemies. Evolve your hero, unlock new abilities, and expand your inventory to prepare for the greatest challenges!

name: StoicScape
description: Recruited by a mysterious wanderer named Marcus Aurelius, you will embark upon a series of "Stoic Trials," where you will gather philosophical insights for his unfinished book, "Meditations." Extract resources, defeat enemies, and confront epic bosses to become a master stoic.

name: Meow Meow Wizard Arena
description: Train your cats in the magical arts to make them strong and powerful! Craft ridiculous costumes and clothe your cats in the finest linen to make them beautiful! Breed your cats with other powerful cats to create even more powerful offspring! Battle other cats in online multiplayer for validation!

name: Escape From Amexs-137
description: A sci-fi first person view point and click adventure game

name: Next King
description: RPG. Play with mouse only. A screen resolution - 1280*720 or 1920*1080

name: Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop
description: In this cozy farming game, you have to run your own farm shop. Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade the island and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the island with life again.

name: MailRabit
description: You are a diligent rabbit whose job is to put mail in the post box. You and the moon love carrots. You will go crazy dancing if you don't keep eating carrots. So use your special skill to make carrots from mochi and keep working.

name: Fruit Slice by Motion Capture
description: This is a very classic fruit cutting game, but it is not controlled by a mouse or touch. Instead, it uses a camera to capture the trajectory of your arm and control the knife light to cut through the fruit . So,You only need a regular camera to experience the joy of real-time motion capture games.

name: Dispatch Madness
description: Manage the flow of a fresh produce warehouse ! Place orders with suppliers, handle incoming pallets, and dispatch them from the loading bay to your customers. Stay cool under pressure ! Deal with the increasing pressure and unexpected events.

name: Soulbind: Prologue
description: Soulbind: Prologue is an action platformer in the Roguelike genre. The hero is a common skeleton and an outsider. But there is one special feature - you can replace your body parts with parts of your opponents' bodies. Learn the backstory and start your journey in the world of Allaar.

name: Retro Mystery Club Vol.2: The Beppu Case
description: The stage is set in Beppu, Oita Prefecture, for the latest installment in this retro mystery series! There, hearts that pass each other by can’t help but grow twisted… Uncover the truth behind a mysterious death with your junior detective, Ken!

name: De3amy
description: "Players, please break the chains of Amy's nightmares with DR3AMy!" Break free from nightmares with the lovely DR3AMy android and Amy. This game contains visual and auditory horror elements. It is not recommended for the elderly or those with a weak heart.

name: Echovale
description: Collect, upgrade, and relax! As you gain more and more cards, you'll be able to upgrade any duplicates you have. Any cards you earn are yours forever! And in your downtime, why not make friends with all the townspeople?

name: Sergei and the Tax Return
description: Sergei and the Tax Return is a small Indie project, it uses a simple design and is mostly text based. At its heart it is a small business / tycoon style game where you delagate work and keep on top of the paperwork.

name: Final Apex
description: Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in "Final Apex," an arcade racing game set in the near future where speed knows no bounds! Step into the driver's seat of seven unique and powerful cars and it's time to unleash the full potential of futuristic racing!

name: Cafe Rosa
description: Cafe Rosa is a cafe management simulator. Serve food to unique customers and earn coins. Manage your own cafe by upgrading the facilities and changing the interior. Dive into the world of cafe ownership and watch your business flourish!

name: Simple Mosaics: Nonogram Puzzles
description: Solve logic puzzles!

name: Nexus PI
description: In a reality stuck in a technologically unadvanced society stricken with the negative impacts of a worldwide climate disaster, you are a uniquely powered private investigator tasked with uncovering advanced technology from another reality with the potential to save your whole world.

name: Quell the Disaster
description: This is a 2D pixel horizontal board through the game, through the mouse and keyboard operation. Gain money by destroying monsters and strengthen your abilities; You can acquire additional weapons for special attacks. Players use maneuvers and their favorite extras to help them through the level.

name: HeroStory
description: 《HeroStory》 is a card battle game that does not contain numerical or random elements.

name: Ninja: Waltz of night
description: "Ninja-Waltz of Night" is a VR action & Roguelike game. Play as a ninja, wield dual blades, clear stages by slaying monsters, and grow stronger. Challenge yourself to see how far you can go!

name: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums
description: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums invites you to dive into the world of feline cunning! Playing as a crafty cat, your mission is to outsmart the unsuspecting neighbor below. Descend the stairs, unleash chaos – spoil food, drown phones, even detonate the microwave.

name: Cold Lazarus
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey with Lazarus amidst Nimbranumbra's asteroid islands. Encounter charismatic characters, explore ancient ruins, quaint villages, and brave the eerie 'Frameworks.' Battle foes, complete quests, and solve puzzles in this captivating hand-drawn fantasy epic!

name: Sushi Bar: Moebius
description: A physics puzzle game. When you put sushi on top of sushi, the sushi you make will flow down the lane. Feed the customers and keep them full! When they are full, the next customer will come. The game is over when the sushi is out of the box! Aim for a high score!

name: Bakaru: Lendas Indígenas Brasileiras
description: Bakaru: Lendas Indígenas Brasileiras is an interactive CD-ROM that contains eight stories about Brazilian folklore, as well as some mini-games.

name: MyMustache
description: "My Mustache" is a narrative game that tells a story about childhood.

name: Palm Paradise Garden
description: Cultivate and nurture your very own world of verdant exotic plant life in this tropical greenhouse gardening game.

name: Captain CoinCoin
description: Help CoinCoin, the farm duck, defend the old farm where he and his friends were born. Construct buildings, harvest resources, train fighters and plan tricks to repel, in turn-based battles, the strange machines that want your land.

name: Mischievous
description: This is a simple and fun classic game in a cartoon style.

name: There Is No Sleep
description: Everyone has nightmares every now and then... but what would you do if a demon trapped you in a nightmare and you couldn't wake up?

name: Hexseeker
description: Combine hexagons in the quest to find the "F". Discover tons of hype unlockables. Compete on numerous Steam leaderboards and enjoy over 20 achievements in this innovative "increaser" style puzzle game. With mouse, keyboard, and game controller input!

name: Slot Fever
description: Slot Fever is the new and realistic slot game on Steam. Play the classic slot, trade your winnings or unlock bonuses. It's fun, addictive and challenging. Download it today and see for yourself!

name: Paranormal Home Invaders
description: Turn the undead restless as you recklessly disturb their place of rest. Invite yourself and your friends into the homes of scary ghouls is hope that you can return safely and earn your minimum wage ghost hunting reward to feed your loved ones.

name: Bombing
description: Play the role of aliens, invade Earth, plunder resources, and eliminate survivors.

name: I'm a Rocker!
description: You are playing a metalhead in a post-apocalyptic point&click adventure game. Your wish is to go to one last metal concert, because who knows what tomorrow will bring. But to do that you need to create the conditions in the form of some equipment and a car.

name: Reblica
description: Reblica is a cyberpunk-style action platformer shooting game. In Ark, a city full of chaos and crime, become the mercenary Bianna, defeat various enemies and complete quests.

name: Home Detective: Immersive Edition
description: With hi-tech tools, and snarky comments from your holographic assistant Steve, it's up to you to explore the crime scenes, piece together the clues, and find the perpetrator!

name: Clash Of Empires
description: "Clash of Empires" is a real-time strategy game where you start from scratch and build your empire into a superpower. Make strategic decisions to overcome other empires. Manage your resources, grow your economy, and expand your country.

name: Nyxia Survivors
description: Protect the world of Nyxia against hordes of monsters and demonic creatures coming from hell. In this Action-Roguelite dynamic game, play multiple heroes, find powerful equipment, spells and talents to defeat mighty enemies and rank among the best.

name: Ramshackle.Exe
description: RAMSHACKLE.EXE is a 3D platformer about a broken repair robot trying to save his mechanical home from a destructive VIRUS. Find and repair viruses to fix the world. Just be careful, your efforts will restore ALL functions, both critical and dangerous.

name: Hexaflip
description: Dive into a world of retro-futuristic aesthetics and high-voltage gameplay in this innovative turn-based strategy game. Every turn unfolds with intriguing possibilities as players combine moves, creating unique and complex strategies on the electrifying hexagonal battlefield.

name: Challenge N°1
description: The hardest platform game ever. Climb to the top before you drown

name: The Legend of Sebb Linus
description: Slip into the role of Sebb Linus, a former NCF agent, and sneak into enemy bases undetected. Stay undetected so as not to raise the alarm. Experience the old-school stealth genre.

name: BlinDead
description: Step into the darkness of "blindDead," a first-person horror game where you play as a blind person trapped in a haunted mansion filled with malevolent plush dolls. Use sound to navigate and survive, uncovering the mystery behind the dolls while evading death at every turn.

name: Pinballtoon
description: Pinballtoon is a Pinball game.

name: Panik
description: Panik is a puzzle game where you must guide the different characters to the goal. But remember: Don't panik!

name: Infinity Knights: Xross
description: A King and his Infinity Knights wield The Armaments - weapons capable of reviving slain enemies. Xross, the newest Infinity Knight, will embark on a life-changing adventure as he experiences both the thrill and dark reality of what it means to be eternal.

name: Stars Era: Abyss Frontier
description: Stars Era: Abyss Frontier is a level-breaking game that combines SLG and rogue elements. Through battles and choices, you can make your team stronger, defeat the twisted monsters and former comrades who have fallen into madness, and gradually move forward. Towards victory.

name: Dumb Castle
description: The Dumb Castle is just made to bully players! Jump into the castle with your friends and get bullied by the various maps and levels waiting for you with some horror elements!

name: Lefties' Righteous Arcade Emporium
description: 1 Controller 2 Players 4 games and 16 Modes. Grab a Partner and share your Steam Deck or PC. Defeat your opponent in Tennis, Hockey or Squash. Engage in an old-fashioned Wild West Shoot Out. Race to your Spaceship before the planet explodes. Join forces and save your city from impending destruction.

name: Plains of Havoc
description: Decimate endless hordes of enemies across the nine realms of Yggdrasil for eternal glory! Plains of Havoc is a fierce 2D top-down roguelite set in the Viking afterlife in which you fight for your rightful place on the global leaderboards.

name: Katana's Path
description: Katana's Path is a fast-paced arena arcade slasher, where you can control your samurai and your katana in a unique game mechanic. Slash through many enemies at a rainy cyberpunk city or colorful forests using the best gear you can get!

name: The Argument Solver
description: Are you tired of solving your arguments the diplomatic way. Grab your Opponent and throw things at each other just like your primate would!

name: Rebuild the Wall
description: Rise up with 1–4 players in chaotic couch co-op to restore a fallen nation!

name: Magic Cauldron: Dungeons
description: Magic Cauldron - Dungeons is a classic dungeon crawler with a pixel art look. The game is reminiscent of the good old days of grid crawlers, which were still completely 3D-free.

name: Stratagem
description: Stratagem is a sci-fi arcade game where you must launch escape pods without sending active ones into colliding orbits.

name: Geomoth Boot Sequence
description: Be THE Geomoth in the new nonlinear indie pixel art platformer metroidvania made by DROQEN, GABE, and PANCELOR in 2023-2024. Jump, Dive, Float, and Fly through over 100 interconnected chambers and unlock over 30 unique powers.

name: Reincarnation Tower
description: Reincarnation Tower gives you the trial to reincarnation. In order to reach the top, you need to overcome several gimmicks using only jumps. Let's take on the challenge carefully, as one failure will have irreversible consequences!

name: TerraStorm
description: TerraStorm, a survival city builder set after World War Two. In our timeline the outcome of the war… Will surprise you.

name: The Cat
description: Face mental challenges as you help the feline overcome rotating platforms in his search for the ball of wool. With hand-drawn graphics, giving the game a unique aesthetic and captivating puzzles, thus testing the player's skill.

name: GhostHunt With Triggered Insaan
description: A Horror Game Featuring Triggered Insaan (Nischay Malhan) as a Ghost Hunter.

name: My Liege
description: In this medieval strategy game, you are the lord of a small noble house, sworn to your liege lord, and tasked with managing the affairs of your house and people. The choices you make today will shape the relationships your house forms and will have last impacts for years and generations to come.

name: Pirates! Showdown: Enhanced Edition
description: A fast-paced game combining real-time strategy and defense tactics. Face off against the fearsome Red Hand privateers in thrilling head-to-head pirate battles on the high sea! Capture towns, guard towers, and much more to strengthen your defense, buff up your ships, and increase your gold supply!

name: Off-Road: Redneck Racing - Off-Road
description: Off-Road allows the player to race high performance buggies and sand rails across six stunning locations. Slide, jump, skid and wheel spin around circuits specifically designed to offer maximum thrills and spills.

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Shining Stars
description: Shining Stars: A free world mode that combines vast map exploration, city-building development, and guild upgrades. Venture into various realms to write a new chapter of history!

name: Garden Life: Supporter Pack
description: A radiant garden, elegant teacups and a table bedecked with flowers: the Garden Party Pack includes two exclusive plants and a wide range of stylish items that you can use to bring out the inviting and festive best in your garden!

name: Guards!: Vanguard Supporter Pack
description: JOIN THE VANGUARDShow your support in a show of valor with the Vanguard Supporter Pack. GUARDS! TO ARMS!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Hitchcock DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Hitchcock

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL

name: Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity DLC
description: Every reckless decision can turn into a perfectly planned crime. Criminals have discovered tons of innovative ways to keep a low profile. Your move, Detective!

name: World of Warships: DLC to Celebrate the Year of the Dragon
description: Celebrate the Lunar New Year by mounting the Lunar Warrior permanent camouflage on your preferred ship and introducing your foes to the Year of the Dragon. Unlock the DLC for free, then fight 10 battles to get 1x Lunar New Year container as an additional reward! Enjoy, Captain!

name: The Leviathan's Fantasy: DLC
description: The Lost Immortal Sect— Lingyun Sect, as a pure stream in the world of cultivation, has always taken it upon itself to protect the mortal world.

name: One More Gate: Companion#1 DLC
description: Incognito isn't just any Squirrol… This companion can sneak in anywhere! This fearless red-haired critter loves changing clothes: glasses, caps, fake moustaches… Prepare to be surprised at the stunning disguises!

name: One More Gate: Companion#2 DLC
description: Vivaldi's bark is all rhythm! The perfect all-season fighting companion. This little Trunknid was nearly firewood. The terrifying prospect resulted in completely wacky foliage! One day all's blooming, and the next all the branches are bare!

name: One More Gate: Companion#3 DLC
description: Gon is a sweet little Dragoone but not so easy to tame! Naturally wary, Gon often changes color to blend into the environment. You'll have to be patient to tame those chameleon scales. It'll be worth the trouble, though!

name: Petit Petit Petit: Specter Pack
description: For "Petit Petit Petit", downloadable contents 1 additional stage (STAGE-5) Additional character x 3 types Roka Beans Melt Mikko This pack includes the following downloadable contents

name: House Flipper: Dine Out
description: Take your flipping business to another level with the Dine Out DLC! Create the tastiest interiors with the new furniture grid measurement system! DIY your logo and lease your restaurants to an up-and-coming entrepreneur. Effortlessly prepare dishes with the Universal Cooker - ready to serve!

name: 100 March Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 March Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Tourney at the Bear Rock
description: Dive into the thrilling world of knight tournaments! Help Hynek compete in jousting, man-to-man combat and archery, as well as to carry out a mysterious quest that will change his life forever.

name: 15th Floor
description: You are stuck in an apartment building with endless floors. Observe your surroundings carefully to go up to the 15th floor and reach the roof of the apartment building. Do not ignore any abnormalities. Your carelessness could result in death.

name: ZDSS: Zombie Drone Survival Show
description: Welcome to the show! Immerse yourself in this thrilling survival rogue-lite. How long can you endure the relentless challenge? Elevate your experience by upgrading combat drones and fortifying the arena with an array of cunning traps.

name: Zero Days Since
description: A co-op survival horror game where you work as a warehouse associate for the world's fastest growing logistics company. Pick orders and stage them for shipment, but watch your back while you work, you can't shake the feeling that something (or things) is watching you.

name: Zero Protocol
description: In this Sci-Fi survival horror game, you must uncover the secrets of the IAS Antarctic Research Complex and try to survive. You will find various endings, puzzles, battles with monsters, and an intriguing plot.

name: Zombies vs. You
description: Step into a world overrun by the undead in this thrilling survival game.

name: Zombies!!! Board Game: NotDeadYet
description: An all event card expansion for the core Zombies!!! game that includes exciting new cards with all new art and new animations to tie the whole package together.

name: Back Rank Chess: Zombie Strike
description: Zombie Pawns are coming for the Back Rank!

name: B1
description: You find yourself lost in a mysterious space in the underground shopping area of a certain building while trying to have lunch. Clear the game presented by someone and aim to escape from the eerie underground shopping area.

name: Hidden Animals Find : Detective Neko
description: Neko and Watson follow several trails to solve the case. What awaits you at the end of the case as you search for the many animals and archenemies hidden within the various aspects of the city?

name: Bam Boom Blade
description: Bam Boom Blade is a physics-based 2D joust game for 2 players. Act as a wuxia riding on a bamboo, and try to defeat your rival using only 2 joysticks on your gamepad! Experience the original Chinese wuxia sword fight aesthetics in the bamboo grove.

name: Greyish White
description: This is a casual parkour game.

name: Tank Tyranny
description: Gear up for an epic tank showdown in this dynamic local multiplayer game! Outwit friends in intense PvP battles or team up to defend against ruthless enemies in PvE!

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Rabbit Hole is a fast paced, tough-as-nails 2D RogueLike-Shooter, made with love for the genre. You are Disc, someone who was suddenly brought to the Rabbit Hole. Collect guns, fight foes and meet strange new characters on your descent to the bottom, all in an attempt to find your heart again.

name: Space Mergers
description: Space Mergers is a satisfying fast-paced puzzle game that encourages critical thinking. Combine blocks to create combos and gain points, reach the highest score you can! There is over a million different ways to play, enjoy some endless fun.

name: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! Love for These Clothes of Desire! - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE 2K24: Cross-Gen Edition
description: Experience a gripping retelling of WrestleMania's greatest moments in 2K Showcase of the Immortals in WWE 2K24, where you can relive a collection of some of the most unforgettable, career-defining matches.

name: WWE 2K24: Season Pass
description: Expand your WWE Universe with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass, featuring 5 post-launch DLC character packs. Additionally, get access at launch to the MyRISE Mega-Boost which includes an additional 200 Attribute Points, and SuperCharger that unlocks all base game WWE legends and throwback arenas.

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
description:
A full remake of a 2001 point-and-click adventure game Amerzone which served as the first game in the later-created Syberia series.

The remake is more like a reimagining of an old classic adventure with new tough puzzles and new challenges.

name: Blade Assault: Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Munchies: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Psychic Eclipse Code: Green
description: A sequel to the first Psychic Eclipse game.

name: Spellsworn
description: A unique blend of deck builder card game and a bullet hell!

name: Berry Berry Mew Mew
description: A Tokyo Mew Mew game made by the Korean dubbers of the anime and was released on CD-Rom for PC.

name: Kour.io
description: Kour.io is thee ultimate first-person multiplayer 3D web shooter experience that will plunge you into heart-pounding battles across so many different maps and alongside a multitude of guns and modes to play with! Kour.io is one of the easiest accessible first-person shooter games due to it being available on both your web browser, and mobile. It possesses numerous game modes ranging from free for all, team deathmatch, gun-game, and Hardpoint! You have the option to select from a variety of classes from AK-47's to Flamethrowers that fit your playstyle to help you ensure you become the #1 Kourian!

name: Guisard Revolution: Bokura wa Omoi wo Mi ni Matou
description: A yaoi visual novel for PS2.

name: Kohitsuji Hokaku Keikaku! Sweet Boys Life
description: Visual novel adaptation of the BL manga.

name: Tenchi Muyo! Mimiri Onsen: Yukemuri no Tabi
description: Tenchi Muyō! Mimiri Onsen: Yukemuri no Tabi is an adventure game based on the Tenchi Muyo anime series. The game is fully-voiced, not including even a dialogue display or subtitles, and progresses as is standard for Japanese adventure games. In each scene, the player can inspect various parts of the scene, move between locations, and talk to each of Tenchi's companions, with the story generally progressing after all relevant options have been exhausted. There are ten different endings depending on the player's choices and who they decide to talk to.

name: Tenchi Muyo! Toko Muyo: Aniraji Collection
description:
Tenchi Muyō! Tōkō Muyō is an anime-like visual novel with constant video clips and CG events featuring full voice-acting for dialogues and Tenchi's thoughts without text-only descriptions whatsoever. The game uses autoplay feature and doesn't wait for you to press button to progress the dialogues, although they can be skipped. At certain moments player's actions let you affect the course of dialogues, but it does not affect an overall ending. The story centers on school love of Tenchi Masaki filled with love troubles. Key heroines from anime series, namely Ryoko, Aeka and Sasami are also present in the story.

Sega Saturn release came out several months after the original PlayStation release, but this package includes:

Tenchi Muyō! Tōkō Muyō game
Bonus CD with opening theme and three audio drama tracks
Bonus CD booklet features a short 4 page comic

name: Targeting Maths Lab 5
description: Play over 20 games for all areas of the maths curriculum targeted towards ages 10-11.

name: The Little Mermaid: Princess of the Underwater Kingdoms
description: Ariel returns in a new story, embarking on a heroic mission to safeguard Triton's kingdom, facing unprecedented challenges in a plot full of intrigue and courage.

name: Kashido
description: A masterpiece board game on the theme of Japanese sweets!

name: Full Speed Animals: The RTA
description: Let's escape from this planet by car? Fly in the sky with a sparrow? Can you run with a cheetah? Or... Customize your character by entering the pit during the game!

name: Jigsaw Kids 1
description: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of kids going on incredible adventures like walking on the moon, flying spaceships or riding dragons!

name: Jigsaw Zoo
description: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of funny animals in the zoo

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2
description:
Endless fun! Advanced Jigsaw Puzzles!
Animals, landscapes, paintings and moving images...
Jigsaw Masterpieces 2 brings the world to life!

name: Rage Quit Bundle
description: Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends Get ready to feel the pain! Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends is a punishing platforming game where you start in the deepest depths of Hell and must escape.

name: Cat Survivors
description: You have 20 minutes

name: Buggy Off-Road Racing
description: The Ultimate Dirt Track Challenge on your Nintendo Switch!

name: Bubble Fresh Fruits
description: Bubble puzzler full of cute fruits!

name: Sphinx: Riddles of the Nile
description: Discover the secrets of the Nile and solve over 500 fascinating puzzles in the magical world of ancient Egypt

name: Pull The Pin: Ball Physic Puzzle
description: Classic physics based puzzle - color the balls and fill the glass with colored balls while avoiding obstacles!

name: Monster Panic
description: Fast-paced Rogue-like! Battle endless monsters, enjoy rapid Rogue-like thrills! Double the choices, unlock more classes, build unique talents! You are the hero!

name: Annihilation
description: Doomed and surrounded, but not yet dead! Take on the role of Annihilator and purge the endless horde in this arcade survival shooter. Featuring roguelike elements and minimal resources: manage your loadouts between waves and strategically invest in war supplies to face the unknown threat.

name: Astro Chef
description: Dive into Astro Chef, a VR culinary adventure like no other! Serve exotic dishes to unique alien customers and rebuild the restaurant's reputation. Master alien ingredients, tackle cosmic puzzles, and experience the thrill of VR cooking solo or in co-op mode.

name: B3
description: B3 will be a first-person VR shooter where you have to defend your base from waves of attacking monsters.

name: Beyond The Board
description: A single player puzzle game that transforms traditional chess into a minimal immersive journey.

name: Black Sails
description: As a daring space buccaneer, assemble your crew, navigate treacherous cosmos, engage in epic battles, and uncover hidden treasures on mysterious planets. Forge your legend as the most notorious captain in the galaxy!

name: Caldera
description: Caldera is set in 1849 at the very beginning of the American Gold Rush, where Players have the opportunity to seek their fortunes and learn about the various Mineralization's responsible for Gold-Bearing Ore! Pan for Gold, Mine for Gold, Dig for Gold, Process Minerals, and more!

name: Catch Me If You Can
description: Catch Me If You Can is a multiplayer hide & seek game that immerses you into the world of Slavic mythology. Pick the role and play as one of the heroes, each having unique abilities.

name: Circle
description: Circle is a tower defense game with a light card system, where you will play as a commander defending the Earth: by building/upgrading weapons on a rotating device called "Circle" and using cards to deal with the continuously invading aliens.

name: Circle Pong
description: Circle Pong is a game. A top down 2D arcade game that adds a unique circular twist to a classic, multiple game modes, and fast paced game play with a high skill ceiling.It's like pong but in a circle.

name: Persona 3 Broken Shadow
description: Persona 3 Broken Shadow is a Persona 3-themed version of the classic arcade game Breakout. In Broken Shadow, there are three difficulty levels and ten stages for each of them. By destroying the shadow blocks, players gain more power and special card effects for hitting certain targets. By clearing stages, players gain mobile phone wallpapers.

name: Persona 3 Illust Puzzle
description: Persona 3 Illust Puzzle is a nonogram-style puzzle game. Like traditional nonograms, cells in a grid must be filled in in order to correctly reveal the image. The puzzles in this game are primarily tied to the Arcana motif of the Persona series with a total of forty puzzles, in color and monochrome difficulty levels. By completing puzzles, players fill out the game's gallery.

name: Megami Tensei QIX: Persona 3
description:
Megami Tensei QIX: Persona 3 (女神転生QIX ペルソナ3) is a Persona 3-themed puzzle game developed for mobile phones. It was offered through the Atlus and Bbmf mobile telephone site called Megaten α starting on April 27, 2007.

It functions similarly to the game it is titled after. Players complete levels by capturing at least 80% of the board. Enemies appear as Shadows and artwork and music from the original game appear.

name: Sex Olympics
description: Sex Olympics has controls comparable to other point-and-click adventures such as the ability to move up, down, left and right, which are context-sensitive to the player's location, as well as commands to take, drop, touch, give, use, go, look, and talk to NPCs. Sex Olympics also has more 'obscene' inputs.

name: Simgirls
description: A classic dating sim, project was started in 1997 by Sim-Man.

name: Chainsaw Maniac
description:
Chainsaw Maniac was a browser-based game made to promote the PlayStation 2 release of Resident Evil 4.

Chainsaw Manaic involved moving left and right into incoming chainsaw Ganado to defeat them in in Nintendo "Game & Watch" styled graphics.

Two competitions were also held where players could win a copy of Resident Evil 4 for PlayStation 2, a PlayStation 2 Chainsaw Controller, or a T-shirt designed for the competition.

name: Tori Note
description:
You are a traveling musician sparrow.
Put some food and goodies in the square and call in the unique musicians' sparrows!

name: Bob The Astronaut
description: Meet Bob, the inept astronaut with a heart of gold and a brain of space dust.Stranded on a random planet, Bob must rely on his laser-grapple guns to leave this planet. Can Bob bumble his way back home, or will he make intergalactic history for all the wrong reasons?

name: Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee
description:
This re-release of the Xbox game Munch’s Oddysee released for Steam in 2016 features a number of assets from the HD re-release such as updated models, assets, sound effects and text font, but the controls are more so in line with the Xbox original. Basically defined as a “fresh port”.

This version would later also release for Nintendo Switch in 2020.

name: Centipede
description: An unofficial port of Atari's Centipede made by Jeff Minter in the early years of Llamasoft.

name: Autograv: Mini
description:
If you're a fan of Autograv, you might enjoy this sneak preview into experimental design and in-progress features on their way to a larger release down the road.

"Autograv /mini/ is a minimalist space for me to experiment with upcoming Autograv features, and to map out end-to-end, high-level gameplay."

name: Kiloblocks
description:
Build your own base, mine, castle or whatever you imagine!

Kiloblocks is a game - editor which allows you moving, building and transforming the terrain in the 3D environment.

name: Face Of The Killer
description:
All the dogs are laughing - there is talk of a new play.
As fireworks burst over XX City, BB finds herself staring into the face of the Killer.

name: Find Together on Stream
description: Find Together on Stream is a chat game that you can play with your Twitch community. It's a game where chat users form words from randomly generated letters in a bowl. As a streamer, you can also create the letters of any word in your language.

name: ExAltered
description: Unofficial card simulator for Altered TCG

name: The FMV Collection 4
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the Bloodshore, I Saw Black Clouds and Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? all in one bundle!

name: Classified: France '44: Overlord Edition
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: FMV Detective
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer their very best FMV Detective games! Featuring The Isle Tide Hotel, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? and The Shapeshifting Detective all in one bundle!

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance + Kaiju Wars - Fight Monsters Bundle
description: Fight with monsters from Kaiju movies or real monsters of WW2 - Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance + Kaiju Wars

name: FMV Murder Mystery Bundle
description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you The Shapeshifting Detective and The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, all discounted in one bundle!

name: FMV Action
description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Bloodshore and Mia and the Dragon Princess all discounted in one bundle!

name: Girls & Blocks
description: Pop classic Tetris blocks and meet adorable girls who are very interested in your attention. But you need to put in effort to achieve what you desire.

name: Shockwaves
description: Shockwaves is a captivating merging puzzle game where strategic placement creates powerful shockwaves, pushing and merging numbers. Challenge yourself with endless scoring or solve intricate puzzles.

name: Endless Dungeon: Ichiban And Kiryu Skin Pack
description: Celebrate the release of the game Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth with this free Skin Pack! The pack includes: - 1 Comrade Ichiban Kasuga Skin - 1 Fassie Kazuma Kiryu Skin See you soon in the Station!

name: Endless Ascent
description: It begins with you waking up in a strange basement after a tranquilizer has been shot, you realize you've been taken hostage. Now, you must escape! Ascend your way out of the mess through a variety of puzzles and avoid traps to ensure your survival.

name: Nekokami: The Human Restoration Project
description: Start a relaxing world-building adventure with Nekokami! Architect beautiful, peaceful worlds in a far-future where Cats rule the universe. Befriend wonderous yet whimsical spirits of nature. Manage Humans. With Cats in charge, what could POSSIBLY go wrong?

name: Sicaria
description: Antwerp 1576, Spanish Fury is putting the city to the sword. You intend to stop the atrocities by eliminating the menace. ​Silhouette is a FREE game made by third year students from Breda University.

name: Bumbi
description: A raging cute precision platformer with unique mechanics and levels to challenge your skills.

name: Cozy Crest
description: Cozy Crest is a cozy open world adventure game for 1-4 players. Master the elemental powers; Water, Earth, Fire, Air and explore a vast world abundant with magic. Make new friends and find love. Cultivate your farm, build up your land and shape a community that evolves with every action!

name: Operation Marakudja
description: Welcome to Operation Marakudja: The heroes of the mangrove swamp arrive in multiplayer to steal Marakudja's precious fruits! Play as Anaka, Risko, Anzel, Mr.Vy and Hevo, ready to do whatever it takes to harvest the fruits !

name: Beach Club Simulator 2024
description: Beach Club Simulator is a very comprehensive beach management game. Develop your beach from zero to hero. Increase your earnings, popularity and business acumen. Enjoy the sea, sand and sun!

name: My Life As An Alchemist
description: The first survivor-like game without any enemies! Choose up to three potions to craft per wave, swiftly gather the required ingredients within a limited time, then craft the best potions to enhance your stats in various ways! Research and unlock new elements to expand your alchemical arsenal!

name: Life Eater
description: If you don't sacrifice your neighbors, the world ends. Life Eater is an horror fantasy kidnapping simulator where you must become intimately familiar with your targets' lives one intrusive action at a time... and hope that the dark god you serve is even real.

name: My Shadow
description: Explore the enigmatic world of My Shadow, a 2.5D Horror Puzzle Platformer where reality blurs. As night descends, illusions materialize, luring you into the intricate depths of your own mind. Unravel the mysteries where the boundaries of reality haze and imagination takes control.

name: Don't! Fret
description: Don't! Fret is stylized first-person psychological mascot-horror game set in a musically themed world. Play as a guitar named Fret to solve puzzles, escape from foes, and uncover the mystery behind Harmonic Heights.

name: Inazuma Eleven Origins
description:
Inazuma Eleven Origins is a hackrom based on the original game of Inazuma Eleven, where the story of the legendary David Evans is intended to be told from his youth.
With over 350 new players, more than 50 custom hissatsu techniques and a completely new map set in the era of David Evans, explore every corner of Inazuma City to uncover all its secrets, and perhaps even become part of the legendary Inazuma Eleven...

name: Origami Treasure
description: Origami Treasure is a 2D platformer, where you are in the role of Papelina, an adventurer in search of the Origami Treasure. Face challenges, obstacles and enemies on this journey with its different folds.

name: The Outlast Trials: Reagent Starter Pack
description: Get ready with the Reagent Starter Pack, which includes exclusive items.

name: Spy 1 Lovecraftian
description: Teen Romance x Comedy x Lovecraftian. This visual novel is a must-play for fans of all three genres. It features a heartwarming romance, hilarious comedy, and edge-of-your-seat thrill. With its engaging story and memorable characters, this visual novel is sure to leave you wanting more.

name: IdleCraft
description: An idle loot short game, with some clicks and a bit of luck, you can beat it.

name: Hentai Puzzle: Clarise
description: Hentai Puzzle: Clarise Is A Relaxing Puzzle Game.

name: Fight till the End!
description: Fight Till the End! is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a courageous character who finds themselves trapped in a deadly game of life and death.

name: Per Aspera Test
description: Survive an intense 5-minute challenge in Per Aspera Test, a nostalgic horror game reminiscent of the PlayStation 1 era. Run, decide, and confront stressful challenges. Run, breathe, think fast - can you handle it? Share results with friends and find out who's the best!

name: TEEFAX: Cold Case
description: Unravel a cold case after an old laptop containing the photos of a long unidentified victim and a strange app called "The Door" is found in an abandoned house. The police reckon it may be a cipher of some sort, but after unsuccessful attempts at decoding it, they turn to the public.

name: Shadow of Engimor
description: Shadow of Engimor promises an enthralling and deep storyline, a captivating world, and colorful adventures. Get ready to immerse yourself in dark mysteries and thrilling moments in this captivating 2D game. Demonstrate your skills and cleverness by diving into the world of Shadow of Engimor.

name: Dragon Is Dead
description: Dragon is Dead is a hack-and-slash, roguelite action platformer. It offers tons of customization fun with different character skill trees and legendary equipment. Overcome repeated deaths to defeat Guernian, the leader of the Dark Dragons.

name: Skill Up!
description: It's time to jump and run! Skill Up provides an extremely satisfying 3D Jump & Run experience combined with exciting colorful stages that wait be mastered... with nothing but pure skill and the might of your hands!

name: Cyan's Snow House
description: "Your place is here." - "Cyan's Snow House" is a dialogue-free, short indie game set in a snowy village, offering a universal, heartwarming experience in just 10 minutes. Enjoy tranquil moments with Cyan and her animal friends, leaving a lasting impression.

name: Ghost Ninja
description: Ghost Ninja is an action-packed game that puts players in the shoes of a skilled assassin.

name: Quantum Odyssey
description: Are you the One to solve the Puzzle of All Puzzles? Enter an award-winning adventure in the realm of Quantum Computing. Program hardware-ready algorithms, hack players, solve decision games, and unlock knowledge to convince Quantum-Enlightened Sages that you Master the Nature of Reality.

name: Nonogram 3D: Mega Puzzle
description: Nonogram 3D: Mega puzzle is a logic and puzzle-solving game. Analyze the hints, then break and paint the puzzles to reveal hidden shapes. Inspired by nonograms (or picross), this 3D variant adds depth to the game while remaining accessible.

name: DeadNeverStop
description: 《DeadNeverStop》 is a roguelike tower defense game. You will be the hero who can use unique defense towers to help the survivors survive from countless zombies. Dozens of defense towers, multiple skills and a large number of battle cards are the key to survive from endless zombies! Good luck!

name: Frog Story: The Power Tongue
description: Join a thrilling journey with a tiny frog and its mighty tongue, collecting fireflies and sealing the shadows of the Dark Toad King. Navigate through a charming puzzle-platformer world across 96 carefully crafted levels.

name: Frog King
description: Dive into Frog King, where survival is key and every leap counts! Face several relentless bosses and ascend to the throne in a world brimming with danger. Miss a jump and plummet into peril; conquer the odds and claim your crown. Will you hop to victory or fall to the depths in your quest to the top

name: Hidden Robo Cats: Bonus Level
description: Hidden Robo Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️

name: Hmph! Hmph! Yowai
description: A Singleplayer Guild Battle RPG where you are a guildmaster. Recruit and manage NPC guild members, construct and defend your guild base, and attack other guilds' bases. Expand your resources through trading and completing guild quests. Defeat all the other guilds and become the top guild!

name: 3D Chess Q14
description: Extended 3D Chess with new figures and complex boards-sizes. Play from 6x6 to 16x16 boards. Additional Figures: Wizard, Gamma and Keeper. Play online, offline or against AI Single board games and hierarchical 3D games. Be the one that beats the most opponents.

name: Ortheo Voyage
description: Ortheo Voyage is a 3D platformer featuring fluid movement, detailed levels, and a dynamic backtrack mechanic that creates thrilling precision challenges. Traverse stunning, stylized environments while racing against time to retrieve gears at each level's end.

name: Waven: Drhell's Bells Pack
description: Check out the Drhell's Bells Pack, a thrilling special offer combining an adorable Drheller pet and 300 Gems - just perfect to start or continue your adventure in style!

name: Sands of Hope
description: Explore this AI-Apocalyptic world, as you wander through the sands and help the last survivors with your magnetic abilities and your canine companion.

name: Maze of Realities: Symphony of Invention Collector's Edition
description: Who says you can't have another otherworldly, literally, adventure? You and your friend have been invited to visit the world of Innovatix! Go on an adventure soon!

name: Synced: Winterfest Pack
description: Unlock this DLC of SYNCED to obtain new Runner and weapon skins, and embrace fresh challenges in the new season - Lambent Dawn.

name: Lust Academy: Season 3
description: Full-body uncompromising adventure for true magic lovers. "Lust Academy - 3" is more than just the sequel of the Lust Academy saga! It's a new, incredible story with fresh and well-known heroes. More feels, more believability, and more passion.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Battle of the Bulge
description: Sin descripción

name: Capoo Pals for MAC Expansion Set
description: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: JR East Train Simulator: Koumi Line (Kobuchizawa to Komoro) Kiha E200 series
description: The Koumi Line is a 78,9 km long line connecting Kobuchizawa Station in Hokuto City, Yamanashi Prefecture and Komoro Station in Komoro City, Nagano Prefecture. The greatest feature of the Koumi Line is that it runs at high elevation.

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Earth's Legacy M.A.I.A
description: Enter a new way to experience Battle Splash 2.0: M.A.I.A - Multi-purposes Artificial Intelligent Agent!

name: Celebrities Hacked: NoirPetal Photo Pack
description: NoirPetal, a successful fashion house owner and perfume creator, has become an inspirational figure for millions. From a determined child with a chemistry set, she's built a fashion empire, with styles seamlessly merging classic and modern trends.

name: Celebrities Hacked: PlushyPixel Photo Pack
description: The pink-haired internet sensation, bridges the world of anime and gaming. This geek goddess adores plushy toys and cherishes every chat with her followers. Though shy, she's on a bold journey to break free from her cocoon. Ready to join her adventure?

name: Celebrities Hacked: LatexUsagi Photo Pack
description: When a charming bunny hops your way out of a passion for cosplay, you can't help but take notice. Her athletic grace, cloaked in a daring outfit, radiates an allure that's both playful and tempting. Are you ready to surrender to her captivating charm, and perhaps even score her number?

name: Celebrities Hacked: Evelyn Photo Pack
description: Evelyn, once known as the sexiest woman on the silver screen, now a formidable TV producer. Her relentless interviews often reveal more than her guests anticipate. Off-screen, she delves into yoga, finding tranquility amidst chaos. Would you dare to join her for a yoga session?

name: HHHalloween
description: Play as a young girl who was sent to an orphanage just a month ago to find the truth about the Halloween demon. The game is a role-playing turn-based RPG. Players need to collect as much candy as possible, talk to passersby as much as possible, and advance the plot.

name: Hop Top
description:
Classic arcade action returns with a brand new look and feel!

The troublesome bugs of Insect Tower took Hop's wings! To get them back, you'll have to chase speedy Wasps and face three kinds of fearsome Flies through five floors of exciting shoot 'em up platforming action. It's up to you to help Hop the Dodo Bird as he hops to the top!

Watch out for tricks and traps, special score items, and even power-up platforms that'll help you turn the tide! Master each insect's specific patterns to score big and blow 'em away!

HOP TOP features 3 modes of play. In Campaign Mode, you'll guide Hop on his quest through the treacherous tower. In Endless Mode, you'll challenge countless waves of bugs and aim for the highest score! Finally, the Arcade Mode honors HOP TOP's arcade origins and shows what it could've been if it really was released back then.

Whichever mode you choose, pick-up-and-play fun awaits you.

name: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Terrains Pack
description: The Terrains Pack includes 2 new terrains for each of the 7 different biomes (Terran, Desert, Lava, Acid, Ice, Swamp and Barren), for a total of 14 completely new and unique 3D terrains.

name: Diablo IV: Dark Pathways Pack
description: Traverse all of Sanctuary with the Dark Pathways Pack.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 1
description: The EMD SD40-2 is a 3,000-horsepower (2,200 kW) C-C diesel-electric locomotive built by EMD from 1972 to 1989. Featuring multiple custom scripted features, PBR textures, and more, this pack includes Union Pacific, Norfolk Southern, Burlington Northern, Rock Island and Cheesie System (B&O) locos.

name: Straight Up
description: Welcome to Straight Up, the thrilling climbing game! Choose maps, jump on objects, climb to the top, collect rewards, unlock characters, climb the leaderboard. Master the climbing, become the champion of Straight Up! Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Straight Up: Farm Crew Characters
description: With this free DLC, you get 4 new characters in the game, who are already waiting for you.

name: Straight Up: Dummy Characters
description: Dive into the world of "Straight Up Dummy Characters" with 20 unique characters in vibrant colors. Personalize them with accessories like glasses and masks. Get the DLC for unforgettable gaming experiences!

name: WhiteTrick: Western
description: Even outside the countryside, his scam continues! Win the breathtaking psychological battle between the police and White. WhiteTrick is a multiplayer turn-based board game that can be enjoyed by up to 4 people.

name: Johnny Bravo: Big Babe Adventure
description: It was a Friday night like any other in this Johnny Bravo’s Big Babe Adventure game. Our slick-haired “hero” was hanging out by the movie theater on chick-flick night, looking for cute babes. Sure enough, they filed out of the theater and onto a bus. Determined, he chased after them. They pulled up to a creepy-looking building. When he tried to follow them, he fell into an underground laboratory! This doesn’t look right, he thought. Are the babes okay? If he can save them, he’ll earn a smooch for sure.

name: Generator Rex: Pack Fighter
description:
Rex will try to stop the evil in the face of Van Kleiss again, and do not let him first take the city and then the whole world.
But first Rex is to defeat all the E.V.O.s, save its friends and fight with assistants of Van Kleiss

name: Shinobi
description: Shinobi is, in essence, a reimagining of the arcade classic for mobile phones. While the levels and the gameplay remain unchanged (Save for the main character being able to take 3 hits before dying) a backstory was added to justify the inclusion of 2 playable characters.

name: Shinobi 2: Phantom Ninja
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Prophecy
description: Sin descripción

name: Devil May Cry 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Park Beyond: Chicken Run - Dawn of the Nugget: Theme World
description:
Welcome the Chickens to Park Beyond! Decorate your dream park in the style of Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget, with new scenery items, flat rides, entertainers, two new maps and more.
Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget - Theme World includes the following content:
• 13 Building Prefabs
• 280+ Scenery Objects
• 6 Animatronics
• 2 Flat Rides & their Impossification
• 3 Entertainers
• 1 Track Type
• 6 Coaster Cars
• 2 Modules
• 2 Sandbox Maps

name: Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe
description: "Water... Land... Sky... Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?" Upgraded with new modes, improvements, and story content from the original web version!

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Sword of the False Apocalypse
description: A sword which heralds calamity. It comes with high stats, making it useful for the early stages of the game. Only equippable by the captain.

name: SnowRunner: Salt of the Earth Vinyl Wrap Pack
description: The Salt of the Earth Vinyl Wrap Pack adds four exclusive skins for the ANK MK38, International Paystar 5070, Caterpillar CT681 and Western Star 6900 TwinSteer trucks. This Pack is included in the Year 4 Pass and immediately available upon purchase.

name: FireWorks Inc.
description: FireWorks Inc. is a serious and fast-paced firefighting game, that combines fun and irony. The world has reached the point of no return due to climate change, and fire stations had to privatize. You are working to afford rent – deciding yourself which lives are worth saving.

name: Call of Duty Endowment: Direct Action Pack
description: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Direct Action Pack Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Infinity Boob Clicker
description: Endlessly click on what you always wanted to! Progress and improve your tools and conquer them all!

name: Battle Teams 2: Free Pack
description: Come and claim your Battle Teams 2 free pack now!

name: Battle Teams 2: Field Marshal Pack
description: Buy this bundle to save 53% off all items!

name: Battle Teams 2: Commander Pack
description: Buy this bundle to save 31% off all items!

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack 2
description: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 2 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and the developers at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Forza Motorsport: 2022 Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro
description: Forza Motorsport 2022 Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro

name: VanillaBeast: Mystery Kink
description: Vanilla and the gang take on a sexy and hilarious story in this "throwback" comedy-horror adventure game spanning across several iconic parody levels including Camp Crystal Fake, BoDangles Chicken & Hoetel, and Strips Ahoy! Gentlemen's Club. Can you solve the mystery of the Legendary Phallus Stones?

name: That Cowgirl Life
description: A cowgirl game that is suitable for children and is based in low-poly environments and is primarily built for VR. This game will receive support and substantial updates that will add to the story as well as adding functionality over the next six years as we explore the beauty and limits of VR.

name: Hardcore!!! MILF Sex Party
description: Hardcore MILF SEX Party is an exciting game that will take you to the heart of an enigmatic motel where horny girls are waiting for you. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the world of virtual reality, where a mysterious motel hides hides many undiscovered sexual adventures.

name: Dirge: Wendigo
description: From the chilling depths of Quetico Forest, where harsh winters shape the land, emerges the Wendigo—a hulking monstrosity born of desperate survival and driven to hunt in the frozen, unforgiving wilderness of Dirge.

name: Dirge: Revenant
description: Stalk the players in a head to head match. Pick them off one by one with your massive strength to crush the humans' skulls. Devour the corpses of your enemies to regain strength to hunt again, or rest from the action for a moment to regain health.

name: Train Simulator Classic: China Railways DF11G
description: Arriving from Just Trains, the China Railways Dongfeng DF11G is a prominent locomotive developed for passenger services across China's national railway system.

name: Last Train Home: Legion Tales
description: Experience new, exhilarating stories from the Czechoslovak Legion on their odyssey home. Join Zoltan, a seasoned veteran and master storyteller, as he fondly recalls tales of courage and brotherhood from those who fought on the frontline.

name: Nyamon Tamer: Retro Edition
description: Nyamon Tamer - Retro Edition is a return to classic monster-taming genre. Tame Nyamon and explore a vast world filled with thrilling turn-based battles and a mysterious legend to uncover. Tamer challenge... Accepted!

name: Command: Showcase - Icebreakers
description: In Showcase: Icebreakers the player must conduct a Freedom of Navigation operation in one of the most inhospitable climates on earth, the Arctic circle. Leading the fleet is the Polar Star, an icebreaker capable of ploughing through the sheets of sea ice.

name: Exotic Fighter
description: Action fighter game.

name: Sex Feets
description: Sex Feets is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom
description: A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom is a 2D game where you face random horrors. Get keys from foes and upgrade your gear. Find new levels, enemies, items, and terrain. Survive as long as you can in this nightmare.

name: Otoko Orgy at Maid Boy Manor
description: Your parents are away and it’s time to play! You can finally get your grubby little hands on the sweet and soft maids that work in your mansion, only to find out that these pretty maids are actually… boys?!

name: Mozentum
description: A completely unique hippie style, movement RPG / immersive adventure sim where you make your own hippy parkour being and discover the secrets of the universe. The movement mechanics in this game must be tried at least once.

name: Magical Angel Fairy Flower
description: This game is suitable for ages 12 and up. Contains suggestive scenes and some violent content.

name: Maxwell's Puzzling Demon
description: "Thermodynamic" puzzle where Maxwell's demon does work of sokoban. Deal those hot blocks with cold blocks so that the demon doesn't get burnt.

name: GymFistprint
description: GymFistprint is an online boxing sparring game, train in the gym to improve your skills and test your limits with people from all over the world!

name: Moonbreaker: Cosmetic Pack
description: Start your adventure in Moonbreaker with exclusive Astra, Zax, and Extilior models, as well as additional paint to customize your Units.

name: PowerBeatsVR: Song Pack 3
description: Dive into 12 exhilarating new tracks, each with three difficulty levels suitable for all fitness levels. Each song is a new challenge, a new adventure, ready to challenge every muscle in your body. Feel the rhythm, embrace the energy, and get closer to your fitness goal with every new beat!

name: Chess for Idiots: Premium
description: By purchasing PREMIUM you receive the Kink skin and access to a special weapon - SeaWeed!

name: My Cute Roommate Irene
description: Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry. Serene is here to help you

name: Micro Dungeon
description: Turn-based gameplay with roguelike and random elements. What could be better?

name: Gold Scrapping Simulator
description: Transform e-waste into gold in this captivating life simulator. Dive deep into the intricate world of electronic recycling, upgrade your tools, and strike fortune. Uncover the secrets of tech wealth in a thrilling quest for precious metals

name: Empyre: Earls of the Deep Earth
description: It's the time before the Flood. The world is a strange place. Especially for you. How do you solve the mystery of your missing memory? Are you trapped? Can you leave? Ever? Enjoy a Neo-Victorian version of the Orient! Embark on a journey to explore a wondrous land filled with mystery and intrigue!

name: Battle Room Beta
description: Join the action-packed world of BATTLE ROOM BETA! Jump into the game right away, no preparation required! Explore different maps, team up with your friends and dominate the competition by making best use of the unique features of your chosen character!

name: The Vault
description: A quick view into another world through the eyes of a single console.

name: Village Farm
description: Welcome to "Village Farm," where the art of farming meets the thrill of strategic gaming!

name: Refrega
description: Real-time strategy, build bases, defend territories, and win battles. Command your troops with cunning and act swiftly to dominate the battlefield. Challenge players in the pursuit of strategic supremacy!

name: Endless Wonder VR
description: Endless Wonder VR is a colorful VR platformer in which you will need to use unique sticks with unique abilities that can be combined in any way to complete a campaign consisting of various levels with a unique stylized environment, enemies and obstacles.

name: My Life as a Cat
description:
"My life as a cat" is a relaxing, slow-paced visual novel about longing for something different than the modern society and searching back to nature. It has AI-generated oil paintings to illustrate the fully voiced and texted story as you progress through it according to your choices.

Will you have what it takes to survive out in the wilderness, or will you steer towards a not-so-favorable ending?

name: Psalm 5:9-13
description: "Psalm 5:9-13" is a first-person psychological horror game with VHS effect. Be careful and attentive, there is something hiding in these rooms, something is watching from the darkness.

name: Black Zork
description: A super fun map treasure hunt game

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Prehistoric Paradise
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Prehistoric themed tables that pack a blast from the past!

name: Sakura And The Airyvixen
description: Sakura and the Airyvixen is an anime-inspired rougelite with cute girls and strategy to spare! Cultivate an adorable team of fighters, then lead them through challenging gauntlets to ultimate victory!

name: CastingPlz
