description: CastingPlz is a 2-player cooperative roguelike game where players take on the roles of two characters with distinct responsibilities: one for attacking and the other for movement.

name: Community Ball
description: This is a indie runner game based on geometry dash, in the game are 7 levels, Feel good, Firefly, My heart and more. The most of the levels have ncs songs so if you are a youtuber you wont have any probrem wirh the songs. In the game you have to collect coins in all levels.

name: Cubethon
description: This is a puzzle game

name: Dark Color
description: This is a casual game where players use directional keys to control character movement

name: Color Splash: Predators
description: Color Splash: Predators is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable predators and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful predators paintings.

name: Area 19
description: First Person Sci Fi Horror Game. Set within a confidential Underground Facility, Navigate through this Abandoned Complex, Discover Government Experiments, Alien Beings, and the haunting aftermath of the Roswell Crash.

name: Astral Vangard
description: Pilot your Vangard and battling against various enemies and bosses. Astral Vangard is a casual game with rogue-like elements in a futuristic world filled with Mecha. You can choose their own Vangard with different start weapon and characteristics, improving their abilities as they advance.

name: LiveMeat
description: This is a first person single player horror adventure game. You need to sneak or run in the scene to avoid monsters, search for resources to survive, and find a way to leave.

name: Night Vigil
description: Come and hunt the monsters of the night! Destroy waves of monsters and welcome the dawn of victory!

name: Spellfolio
description: Create the best set of magic scrolls to defeat waves of enemies.

name: Solo Flight
description: Save your town in this action-packed, shoot-em-up, flight simulation game after a giant, alien worm rudely attempted to remove your civilization from existence. Start your engine, pilot and welcome to Solo Flight!

name: Cracking the Stone
description: Enter the life of a boy experiencing tragedy for the first time, the burden of his parents' hopes & dreams, and the struggle to let his emotions in. Deflect the negative emotions coming from outside forces while trying to juggle the ins and outs of childhood, puberty, and relationships.

name: Lightclusters
description: Step into the world of Lightclusters - a 3D, ARPG set amongst the stars. Start off as Citrine, a young Star, suddenly forced to battle against her own kind when internal conflicts erupt. Take on unique and challenging bosses in your journey to defeat Tenebris, the leader of the Corrupted Stars.

name: Space Survivor
description: Space Survivor is a space-themed rogue-like game. Piloting and upgrading spaceships, recruiting crew members, recruit wingmen, constructing space station defense systems, and defending the space station.

name: Gas Gas Rocket!
description: Gas Gas Rocket! is an action-packed game that puts you in control of a rocket hurtling through space on an unusual and dangerous route

name: Bump in the Night
description: Bump in the Night is a single player game where strategy meets psychological horror. Confined to one room, you'll use cameras and a whiteboard to direct NPCs and collect evidence. Each environment offers unique challenges and frights.

name: The Outlast Trials: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the mind-numbing horror of Outlast, this time with friends.

name: Classified: France '44 - Deluxe Edition
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Supporter II Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Decontaminator Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Evil Eyes
description: Sin descripción

name: Drunken Superhero
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed
description: Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!

name: Estab Life: Unity Memories
description:
Estab Life: Unity Memories is a multiplayer action role-playing video game developed and published by Square Enix that was announced in 2022 as part of a multimedia promotion of the Estab Life manga.

As of March 2024, this game has not been released yet.

name: Stick Stunt Biker
description: Bike fun and challenging tracks using your destructible stick biker including jumps, loops, fire and other funny obstacles. Stick Stunt Biker is an agile and fast physic based bike game, with new updates every few weeks.

name: Catacombs
description: Catacombs was a team shooter RPG, planned to develop by Cavia after NieR with Square Enix publishing.

name: Puzzlerama
description: Puzzlerama is a collection of the best puzzles in the store: Lines, Tangram, Pipes, Blocks, Dots, Shikaku, Unroll, Unblock, Sokoban and Bridges all in one game. It is the definitive stop for puzzle lovers, with more than 4,000 levels to relax, unwind and sharpen your logic skills. Better than any brain training, these Zen puzzles have no time limits but almost infinite fun! Puzzlerama merged all the king puzzles in a collection that will keep your mind active and entertained for hundreds of hours. And more puzzle games will be added in the future.

name: The Box
description: The Box began as a Silent Hill proposal, however it is unclear if Konami were ever presented the project, as Silicon Knights soon partnered with SEGA to produce the game. The Box was supposed to be an “open world third person survival horror experience” for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. [source:silenthillmemories]

name: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters
description: The Apple iOS version of Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters, which released at the same time as the console release. Unlike the console release, it plays like a rail shooter.

name: The 257th Element
description: In 2032, Tokyo scientists unveil Araraginium, the 257th element, capable of materializing matter and bringing back the deceased as Araragi Humans. Masakazu Tokimune, a Japanese high school student, grapples with daily life's blend of humor, intrigue, and love.

name: BBC-rex
description:
This game is inspired by Dinosaur Game, also known as T-Rex Game and Dino Runner from Google Chrome and it was written for the Retro-Trex game jam of Retro Programmers Inside and Phaze101.

Run as far as you can while avoiding obstacles such as cacti, rocks, birds, etc.

Every 50 points you go to the next level

name: Krezber
description:
This is a new version of the classic arcade game Berzerk. In it you must avoid colliding with the walls, eliminate the enemies and leave the screen before Evil Otto appears and chases you.

This version has three game modes:

Original endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies.

New mode endless: It is an infinite mode, in which you must advance screens eliminating enemies you can use powerups.

New mode arcade : You must find the exit in each of the levels, you can use powerups an map.

name: Colorful
description: Sin descripción

name: 81-tris
description: Developed by Salvacam, this is his own version of the classic game for ZX81, with two game modes, redefinable keys and pause. In arcade mode it changes screen when you do 10 lines.

name: Escape from Tokat Dungeon
description: You have to take the keys and go to the exit, avoiding enemies.

name: Virus
description:
Never did like office parties...

Christmas eve, and the staff at Macrobiology Industries Limited were having the usual office party, with all the usual hi-jinx and tears, but something very unusual was happening in the biohazard containment fridge. The predicted pandemic had never occurred, and so the fridge was full of unused swine-flu vaccines, but that night it jostled for space with the secretary's cucumber sandwiches and the boss's - sorry, not his, a friends - Viagra supply, all stored there for safe keeping until the party really got started. But the disco lights overloaded the generator, the fuses blew, the fridge shut off, and the staff all went their separate ways home to sleep off the excesses.

January 2nd, happy new year! The security guard, first on site that morning, was slowly working his way around the offices and labs, tripping the fuse boxes back to life. He shook his head, bemused by the broken hinges on the doors, but the smashed containment fridge, and mucus-like stains on the walls and floor scared him enough to grab his SHARPS pistol, as strange things moved just out of sight...

name: Boulder Logic
description: Bradford Walker-Smythe needs to find the perfect engagement ring to win the heart of his true love Tania when he asks for her hand in marriage. And so, to prove his devotion, he sets off to the Cornish mines in search of the perfect diamond...

name: Palo T Game and Watch
description: A reboot of the Game and Watch title Helmet, with Palo T as the protagonist.

name: Pokémon: A Farfetch'd Story
description:
Farley the Galarian Farfetch'd is lost after an unexpected storm!
Will Farley solve this weather problem in the Alto region and perhaps find his way home?...

name: Lunares Insaniam
description:
A ZX81 conversion of Ocean's Transversion, an early ZX Spectrum game.

Simple, challenging and fun to play, this is a fast action game with support for the Chroma colour interface and a couple of joystick options. Features a demo mode and high score table

name: Ascii Sector
description:
Ascii Sector is a free space combat/exploration/trading game for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. You start with a simple spaceship and can then accept missions or trade goods to earn enough money to upgrade your ship or buy a new one.

You can engage in deadly fights both in space, on the ground and on board spaceships, and using the Ascii Sector scripting language, you can create your own quests for the game or have fun with other players' quests.

name: Impact!
description: Bob Smith's interpretation of Atari's 1979 arcade game 'Asteroids'.

name: Mario's Cement Factory C64
description:
This is a Commodore 64 port of a Game and Watch classic.

The player controls Mario working in a cement factory, where one has to make sure the cement carried from the top of the screen reaches one of the two concrete mixers on the lower corners of the screen safely. The cement can't go directly into the mixers though. It must first go through four tanks which Mario can open by activating levers. His task is to go back and forth between all four spots and release the concrete before anything is spilled. Failure to do so will result in dumping of said concrete on the truckers waiting to make their delivery. To reach the different levers Mario must travel between floors via elevators, which must be taken carefully to avoid Mario falling off. Game B is a harder version of the game.

name: Yewdow
description:
Place the arrow, change the direction of the car, and pass all the flags to clear the game.

If the car goes off-screen or hits a rock, it is a failure.

If the car hits a wall, it will flip, but the wall will disappear.

name: Harmonia: Full HD Edition
description: Set in a war-torn world in the distant future, the sci-fi kinetic novel "Harmonia" follows a mechanical boy and a human girl as they find their way to each other's hearts. Key's 15th anniversary title is back with full voice and FHD resolution, including the main character!

name: Magical Fantasista
description:
Aim for a brilliant and outstanding wizard "Fantasista"!
Players should become "Horin", a student of the magic vocational school of the magical kingdom "Nebula" and clear the assignment while exploring the "Seven Yosei" area at the magic synthesis repair camp. Through the adventure, "Horin" will grow greatly, and eventually you will create a powerful magic and aim for the "Fantasista" of the magical world.

name: The 7th Circle: Endless Nightmare Update
description:
Endless Nightmare was an update released with Gamera Interactive as part of their ReLaunch publishing program for indie games.

Along with bug fixes and quality of life improvements the update added the inferno difficulty mode and 4 post-game dungeons. The additional dungeons offer unique challenges like random dungeon modifiers or an endless mode.

name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects which got cancelled due to the eventual closing of EA and Marvel's partnership in 2008.

name: Oni 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Oni which would have been developed by Angel Studios and would’ve improved upon the combat system.

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy
description: A bundle of the first three S.T.A.L.K.E.R. games released on consoles for the first time.

name: Orion Haste
description: Run and gun through 7 levels of alien-infested mayhem to save mankind from annihilation! Shoot enemies with powerful weapons, defeat colossal bosses, and even race to beat your best time in this nostalgic platform shooter. As a human soldier stationed on a military fort in outer space, you must answer the distress signal emanating from a nearby planet. It’s time to channel your inner heroic retro game commando and obliterate the alien horde!

name: Focus Tower
description: Are you brave enough to climb the Focus Tower?

name: Halo 3: Combat Evolved
description:
Halo 3: Combat Evolved is a mod for Halo 3: ODST that re-creates the Halo: Combat Evolved Multiplayer and Campaign experiences within Halo 3: ODST.

The goal of this project is to remake every single Campaign and Multiplayer level from Halo: Combat Evolved.

name: My Friend Pedro: Arena
description: Use acrobatics, reflexes and a sh*t tone of bullets to gain the highest score in one of the six available levels! This game has all the exciting bits from the original 'My Friend Pedro', but put in the new context of Arena-mode, a mode which will put your survival instinct to the test! How long will you survive?

name: Home of the Yokai
description: Home of the Yokai is a creature collecting Eastern fantasy RPG featuring an expansive world filled with rich stories and unique Yokai. Tasked to uncover a mysterious evil, you embark on a journey with your Yokai, forming new friendships, engage in intense battles, and face countless challenges!

name: Goals
description: Gameplay-first, free to play, cross-play, multiplayer-focused and esports-ready football game in which every footballer will be unique.

name: Zerlizan: The shadow of crime
description: On a barren planet, lacking resources and marked by harsh living conditions, you find yourself in the role of a young intelligence officer on the outskirts of civilization. In a disciplined society, rooted in a feudalistic system of government and deeply committed to the concept of honor, you are assigned the mission to investigate a possible murder in a impoverished and desertic village...

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Trial of Allegiance
description: Explore alternate WWII histories in "Trial of Allegiance" for Hearts of Iron IV. Lead South American nations like Argentina, Brazil, or Chile. Build a superpower or join global blocs, using regional resources and manpower for a unique, glorious future.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 28
description:
The map service has been updated to closely reflect regional preferences.
Introducing PUBG's first electric vehicle. Ride the new 6-seater Pico Bus and discover the unique charm of electric vehicles as you hit the roads of Rondo! Explore new ways to jump, strengthen teamwork, and have a bit more fun with our new vaulting features.

name: Pipe Escape
description: A 2D puzzle game with a spin! Make your way through obstacle courses of pipes, water streams and bats as fast as you can whilst spinning out of control.

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom & Spirit of Liberty - Independence Bundle
description: Fight for the Independence - Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom & Spirit of Liberty

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered: Sunset Harbor
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Fairy Fantasy
description: Class dark brush game, equipment driven, there are combat AIDS, liver can be placed

name: Eldritch Climb
description:
Get to the heart of a mysterious mountain by swinging and climbing in this Roguelike Platformer. Gain eyes through your journey to reveal the horrifying and challenging altered versions of levels. Keep on trying with the aid of crazy items that both help you navigate and fight your way to the top.

There are Lovecraftian Horrors waiting to be unveiled... Will you chose to keep your sanity or will you accept the Mountain's lure...

Can you hear the calling?

name: Let's Patiti!
description: "Let's Patiti!" is a multiplayer party game that supports 2-4 players and can be played online or locally. In the game, you take on the role of an adorable little cat, engaging in a game of chase and cunning competition with your "Meow Meow" friends or AI in the "Meow Meow Forest".

name: Panzer Corps 2: Frontlines - Bulge
description: Bulge introduces players to the first downloadable content, immersing them in a dynamic and engaging narrative battlefield that unfolds during the epic Battle of the Bulge, starting a few days before the fateful date of December 16th, 1944

name: Coloring Pixels: Machines Pack
description: This Machines-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Cogs and Gears and Pistons, oh my! Covering images of all kinds of machines and moving parts!

name: Coloring Pixels: Lunar New Year Pack
description: Lunar New Year BookThis Lunar New Year-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Celebrate the Lunar New Year with Coloring Pixels!Covering all New Year animals and a celebration of traditions!

name: Super Math Saga
description: Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math, designed to help players improve their math arithmetic in a fun way. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. Beat all the levels to face the final boss!

name: The Dream Within
description: A pixel-graphics open world survival craft RPG, where players are locked in a deep dream world, survive and rescue yourself in this unstable world, forage, hunt, mine, and build up shelters. Find a way to escape.

name: Firespike
description: How many Waves can you survive? Firespike is an wave survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. You play an rifleman and defeat the hordes of skeletons that come each wave. Each Wave gets progressively more difficult.

name: Endless Halo
description: This is a military competition experience game with a super large realistic map

name: Blue Rain
description: This is a casual game with a beautiful appearance in the game background.

name: Everloop
description: You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.

name: DriftCE: Toyota Supra MK4
description: The Toyota Supra MK4 is the first DLC released in DRIFTCE - bringing into the game one of the most iconic and remarkable drifting cars ever created by Toyota. Now it's time to show off the world what you're made of - see you on the track!

name: Dusty the Lazy Cat
description: Dusty the Lazy Cat is a puzzle game where the main character Dusty goes through different worlds and levels. He must also deal with enemies and solve puzzles.

name: AfroCobra
description: A side scrolling action love letter to Kung Fu Master / Spartan X. Jump, dodge, and kick your way through a flood of increasingly challenging enemies and stage bosses.

name: Reveil: Funhouse Pack
description: The Funhouse Pack contains all DLC for REVEIL

name: The Devil is in the Details
description: You're trapped in hell, and the only way out is to beat the devil at its own game. With the help of a mysterious entity known only as 'The Arbiter,' navigate through ominous surroundings and place talismans on cursed objects while trying to survive the many traps and foes lurking in the shadows.

name: Cubix
description: Cubix is an exciting game with challenging jumps and puzzles. Embark on an adventure where every step is taken with deliberation, and every level is filled with incredible challenges. Relive the thrill of this platformer!

name: Lobby 2
description: Play as Fallenshadow by taking on the form of 12 girls and access 70 perks to help you fight off your husbands.

name: Exit the Museum
description: Exit the museum is a game highly inspired by "Exit 8". You are the security guard of a museum and have to go through nine appearingly similar rooms. There is a ~30% chance of nothing beeing wrong in comparison to the first "Showroom".

name: Barbotine
description: An atmospheric horror micro-game that touches on topics of anxiety, isolation, body image and obsessive habits with a surreal PSX aesthetic.

name: Buckshot Arena
description: Play Russian Roulette in western setting with a shotgun loaded with live and blank shells. Use items to gain a tactical advantage. Fight against friends or random people at the same table of up to 8 people and become the last survivor with full pockets of money.

name: Backrooms: The Exit
description: Backrooms: The Exit is a single-player adventure game based on theme of backrooms.Inside the game you will need to avoid all threatening entities and find the cutscenes (exits) for each level, and perhaps many unexpected ways out of a level.

name: Taxi Driver Life VR
description: Experience the thrill of real taxi driving in Taxi Life! Navigate through city streets, encounter diverse customers and tackle various tasks as you manage your taxi.With realistic graphics, dynamic weather and detailed vehicle controls, immerse yourself in the world of taxi driving like never before

name: Brick Breaker Pro
description: Brick Breaker Pro offers classic arcade fun with a modern twist! Break bricks, set high scores, and unlock achievements in this vibrant and addictive game.

name: Plant Therapy: Dog Art Pack
description: Add a little more WOOF to your life! This new art pack adds over 30 new dog related art items to the game Plant Therapy. This includes a new skin for the Gatabot!

name: Sword of the King: The Classic of Mountains and Seas
description: This is an action adventure game set in the context of Chinese classical mythology. The game incorporates a unique mechanism of sword flight, allowing players to freely soar in the air. Players need to master various sword techniques, attack accurately, and move flexibly to defeat enemies.

name: Looper Tactics: Tower and Sea
description: In Tower and Sea DLC, you will unlock the Human race cards, featuring the new hero , along with new cards, treasures, keywords, and challenging dungeons. Explore exciting gameplay elements in this expansion!

name: MedCom Origin
description: MedCom Origin is a story about russian city in which the pathogen outbreak occurred. PMCs shoot people right on the streets of the city, parks and squares are turned into warehouses for corpses Welcome to the city, welcome to the hell.

name: Paper Planes
description: Fly, shoot, and even nuke your friends in Paper Planes! This 2D arcade style shooter is played with up to four players, control a plane or maybe even a wizard all while trying to eliminate each other from out of the sky. Come fly with your friends and crown yourself the victor.

name: Burning Ass
description: It is a multiplayer platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world full of mysteries, where water is the most valuable resource. If you are an hardcore player, bypass all the traps and be the first to get it! Blood, Gore, Fun!

name: Street Cleaner Simulator
description: Have you ever dreamed of cleaning the streets? This game is for you

name: NoName
description: NONAME is a strategy, puzzle battler with tons of tactics to win once and for all. We invite you to enter a unique game world that requires logic and wits!

name: Jusfaslex
description: JUSFASLEX is a short kinetic visual novel about a dreamy boy who strives to create a society in a different dimension while struggling to connect to others.

name: Sigils
description: Sigils is a stylized Action Strategy Magic Cards adventure where you create powerful sigil guardians and grow stronger as you progress through the treacherous environment.

name: Super Kye
description: **Super Kye** is a puzzle adventure with unique challenges and a level editor. Navigate mazes, solve puzzles, and unlock levels in a game where strategy meets creativity.

name: Marie's Travel
description: "The Traveller: Maries" is a highly interactive search and puzzle development game.

name: Beware the Depths
description: Get in. Get Loot. Get out. Countless misguided souls have delved into the unknown Depths. Some seek riches, others, long-lost arcane secrets, and for a few: heroic glory for the sake of mankind. No matter what it is that you seek - if you want to stay alive, always remember to Beware the Depths.

name: Phenom Overdrive
description: A space adventure across colorful and abstract environments with simple controls and mechanics. Featuring precise, physics based, action. Sometimes a fast-paced thrill. Sometimes a slightly methodic thinker. Sometimes, even, a rage inducing dread. Always exhilarating.

name: Hidden Cats In Breeze Village
description: Find cute cats in Breeze Village. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Platformer
description: Explore a new world, traverse randomly generated landscapes, fight monsters, dig for materials, craft equipment, find treasure and trinkets to increase your strength, build a house to protect yourself at night, dig deep to find greater challenges, unique weapons, and more!

name: PixelCaves
description: A Game where you need to run as fast as you can.

name: Deepwell
description: Deepwell is a story-driven adventure game, about a small town surrounding a giant mystery hole.

name: Beats of Betrayal
description: Beats of Betrayal is an adventure game with roguelike mechanics and rhythm-based combat. Explore dungeons, gain skills and grow stronger to defeat challenging bosses and unlock the secrets surrounding the 'Power of the Waves'!

name: Hidden Clues 2: Miami
description: The murders are rampant in Miami! Follow the clues to crack the cases and arrest the killers!

name: Outflow
description: Experience Atlas’s journey in the future world to save his planet. Beat the enemies with unique mechanics and explore a huge open world in this action RPG.

name: Caleuche
description: You are on a fishing boat, capturing your last game for the night. As you hear a distant noise, you watch as a ship is rushing at your small vessel. This ship will test, attack and call you to action; your decisions have consequences, make them wisely.

name: Backrooms: Last Room
description: Experience the unknown world of utility rooms through a VHS camera, you will have to feel all the fear and anxiety of loneliness, plunging deeper and deeper into the world of utility rooms behind the scenes In search of that very, cherished, last room

name: FoxyRush
description: FoxyRush is an exciting and exciting adventure that will appeal to all fans of foxes, platformers, runners and puzzles!

name: Repterra
description: Repterra is a base-building survival game set in a world overrun by dinosaurs. Fend off massive hordes while building your colony. Manage resources and grow your army to survive in this dino-infested land.

name: Statecraft: Corrupted Democracy
description: Statecraft is a game that adds humor to political party management. In the atmosphere of the 70s and 80s, shape your country, defeat your opponents, come to power. Fight, stage a coup, make allies. Statecraft invites you to the exciting and corrupt world of politics.

name: Crypt Crawler
description: Descend 16 monster-filled levels to close the gate to the Underworld in this top-down tower defense dungeon crawler. Gather resources, discover blueprints, and build defensive towers to slice, dice, zap, and explode undead hordes. Play solo or 2-4 player local co-op.

name: All You Can Take
description: Ever dreamed of becoming rich overnight, but don't fancy doing all that pesky hard work? You have one night to loot as much as you can from a house - just don't wake the owner! A 1-4 player physic-based stealth-robbery game.

name: Tomboy: Sex in the Forest
description: You are an ordinary programmer John. Your life revolves entirely around computers, but today, your favorite tomboy invites you to spend a weekend outdoors with her. How lucky?!

name: Summonsters
description: Summonsters is a roguelike auto-battler game where you buy summons and combine artifacts to survive against oncoming enemies. Utilize summons that fight on your behalf to defeat bosses and elites. To ensure survival, strategically combine artifacts to forge powerful legendary artifacts.

name: Astral Arena
description: Create & Combat mystical creatures known as Astrals in this Monster Tamer Roguelike with unique Real Time Combat!

name: Dungeon Battles
description: Manage the shared inventory of your party of adventurers and send them out to fight against other players in this roguelike auto-battler. Reforge and combine your items to change their shape and exploit the grid bonuses to the fullest.

name: White Redemption
description: An adventure game that can be played with a picture book feel, without text in the game.

name: Relationship Anarchy
description: Investigate procedurally generated hidden relationships in a casual mystery game. Explore, find clues, deduce, infer, solve the puzzle, and unravel the true meaning.

name: Fancyland
description: After breaking in to an abandoned indoor amusement park, finding clues and solving puzzles, you soon realize that your investigation is not just a search for answers, but a desperate struggle for survival against a sinister force that lurks within.

name: Head Over Heels
description: A dullahan goes to a speed-dating event: Will she fall head over heels or trip up on her chances for love?

name: Rubbings
description: Rubbings is a Chinese folklore horror puzzle game. Four unbelievable topiaries follow each other like shadows, and four creepy stories come to mind in the middle of the night.

name: Aurans
description: Aurans is a kinetic visual novel, meaning it is linear and with no choices. It is a story about coming of age, learning to believe in yourself, and finding out what really matters to you. Everything is fully hand drawn, and is the first visual novel project of Pixelsplosion Studios.

name: Pixel Pete
description: Pixel Pete is an action-packed platformer game where you play as the intrepid Pixel Pete. Armed with a trusty FISH GUN, additional weaponry, and a talking cardboard cutout that only he can see and hear, as he embarks on a mission to collapse the multiverse and find his way back home.

name: Cats of the Ming Dynasty
description: Explore the ancient city of Suzhou during the Ming Dynasty and find the delightful cats!

name: This Is No Cave
description: This is no Cave! You better run, jump and swing! You're the unluckiest astronaut that has ever been sent to space. You've been captured and thrown into this fast paced 2D platform runner. Try to escape the caves and join back your ship, hopefully the worms won't catch you!

name: Asteroid Drift
description: Asteroid Drift is a challenging spaceship piloting arcade game. Success is all about controlling your momentum and inertia. Don't explode, and go faster and faster to earn higher medals.

name: The Lord of Time
description: You find yourself on a strange planet known as Earth and must follow the orders of the Zenti.

name: Nine Nights
description: In Northeast China, there is a beautiful legend about the little fox fairy: In ancient times, the Five Immortals and Holy Spirit lived in the deep mountains and forests of Northeast China, guarding this land and all things inside. Every Holy Spirit possesses a unique power and mission.

name: Crab Attack
description: Extraction-lite meets SHMUP. Get more upgrade materials by exploring dangerous places as far as you can go, just be sure to escape before you get pinched or you'll lose everything you've collected.

name: My Grandpa's Haunted House
description: My Grandpa's Haunted House is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a girl named Emily who has returned to her grandpa's house from abroad only to find out that her grandpa passed away and his spirit got trapped in the house by a Demon.

name: I am the Law
description: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: Korga's Arena
description: We combined a Roguelite Deckbuilder, a Turn-Based RPG, and a bloodthirsty orc battle-mage, to create Qrena! Craft your Deck, enhance your Weapons, and forge your Gladiator Emblem to customize your playstyle.

name: Grim
description: Grim is a horror game inspired from Taiwanese folklore “Aunt Tiger”. The player will play in a room-oriented 3rd-person perspective as a “ghost” and will observe the world from fixed camera perspectives to solve puzzles and survive the monster’s pursuit.

name: Xetanon
description: Xetanon is a short puzzle game, where you are testing the soon to be released Electricity 3.0.

name: Up & Down
description: Navigate through a limitless survival challenge, "Jump or Fly" to avoid the never-ending obstacles to beat your personal high score in an unlimited and exhilarating gaming experience!

name: Cubon
description: Cubon is a casual platform and puzzle game where you have to find your place in the world. Jump, open doors, and find your way through each level. But watch out! Everywhere you go, you'll leave a trace behind you, making it impossible for you to go back to the same place again.

name: Undeliverable
description: Arcade style fast paced driving and delivery game where you drop off packages, mail, food, or people at their destinations.

name: Sea and Adventure
description: sea and Adventure is a game with platform jumping adventure and strategic sea battle gameplay as its core. It has some difficulty getting started, but it can really improve your abilities

name: Cryptic Escape
description: Monsters are taking hard earned dwarven treasure, and the dwarves have had enough. You are chosen are their champion, and are sent into the dungeons to recover your treasure, problem is... No one taught you how to fight the monsters, so your best option is to sneak by, and hope they don't catch you.

name: Eden Crafters
description: Embark on a journey of survival, crafting, and automation in Eden Crafters, a co-op, open-world game that challenges you to turn a hostile planet into a habitable haven for humanity. Temper the climate, create a breathable atmosphere, and turn toxic lakes into water: shape a new world!

name: Lunar Loot
description: Plow through swarms of aliens! Lunar Loot is a casual incremental game with hints of survivor-like gameplay. Kill aliens, acquire Moonshards, spend those Moonshards, and repeat. It's simple! No death! No stress! Just get rich killing aliens!
